phrases: I forget what I was like before I met you
Kick my heels going down the slope
It is like an endless summer vacation
Feels like sneakin' into the swimming pool
Hey, let us swim with our clothes on, jump in!!
This beat that pierces my heart is strange
Do not you go, it is twined around my ears
and will not leave me ever again
Cannot let myself get my hopes up.
I have already been rejected once.
Do you have the usual, Madam?
You are looking beautiful as always, Madam!
What is with the long face?
You are in shock over the news that Yurika-senpai eloped?
It is all over the school!
D-Did you tell him about it?!
Yeah, I told him this morning...
I do not think he is in the classroom!
I did not expect to hear anything like this...
How must he feel about it?
Ah, that is the one that won the Prefectural Governor's Award.
We would better take it down now.
There is no way the school will display a painting
by a student who is involved in a scandal.
We were told to remove it.
And what is going to happen to it after you take it down?
What is she to you, anyway?
Had eyes for her, did ya?
You do not care what happens to that painting?!
Seriously, how stupid are you going to be for somebody else's sake?
Oh, I already said my goodbye to it back there.
Have you gotten a present from someone recently?
I knitted Sentaro a sweater and used the leftover yarn to make the mittens!
It is called Lily-yarn or something.
I got it from Sachiko yesterday.
But what am I supposed to do with this string?
Now you are going to get it!
Come to think of it, we will be changing classes again soon.
I guess third-years are split up according to their grades,
so you probably will not be in the same class as Kaoru-san.
Going for college entrance exams, right Richie?
I intend to go to college, too.
I am thinking about becoming an elementary school teacher.
So you are going to be a teacher, huh?
Long time ago, you said you wanted to have a bakery or cake shop.
Come on, do not you remember?
That is why you wanted a shop!
Kaoru-san, where do you want to go to college?
Oh, I... have not decided yet.
As for me, never mind about college.
I might not even make it to third-year.
Wait, what did you just say?!
Alright, it all comes down to the next make-up exam.
I will make you some flash cards in the meanwhile.
I am just not cut out for studying.
What are you going to do if you fail this?!
Oh, I will just quit school an' get a job.
When I think about my family, I cannot afford to repeat a year.
I will not let that happen!
I am not going to let you flunk this test!
You are in the middle of these questions!
If you are going to rest, it will have to wait'til you are done with these problems!
You look really happy when you are surrounded by children.
I bet you are going to have a big family of your own,
with lots of kids around you.
My ma will dry your pants, so relax in the meantime.
This is an unusual setup for a bath...
You are out of soap, right?
Is not this Sen's family's bath?
We share the bath with Sentaro's family...
Um... I wish I had given the mittens to you earlier...
It is almost spring, so you will not need to use them anymore...
Since you knitted the mittens, Ri-chan, I would like to wear them all year'round.
Sentaro let us out a yelp once in a while himself.
Say, Ri-chan, why did you give me those mittens?
I mean... if you have liked him all this time...
Your pants are not dry yet anyway...
I did not mean to say that to Ri-chan.
But I could not get it out of my mind...
That she probably still has feelings for him...
Sen, how did the make-up exam go?
I got to thank'i am proper.
Come to think of it, I have not seen Richie-rich lately.
The day before yesterday, he passed out in class with a fever,
so he is restin' up at home.
Nope, Ritsuko did not say a thing.
Thank Richie for me, for helpin' me study.
Kaoru-san, one of your classmates has come to wish you well.
Eat them if you are up to it.
Did you go out of the way to buy them?
Um... No. I did not buy these.
He came here with you, did not he?
I saw you two out the window.
He should have come in with you...
You two have been together since you were little.
There is no way I could be a match for him...
Unlike me, he is strong... and built...
And so handsome, he even takes my breath away once in a while...
Ri-chan, you are better off with him...
I know what you are saying, so do not say any more.
Kaoru-san, do not you like me anymore?
Kaoru-san, you told me to have confidence in myself.
Those words have saved me a number of times.
But if it looks like you do not have confidence,
I have a feeling I will lose mine, too.
What the heck am I doing?
What I have wished for all this time...
I bet something happened between those two!
I will go over to you!
Let me tell you how I feel about you one more time...
I am not muscular and maybe I am not as manly as I should be...
Here it is summer already and I have not made any more progress with Ri-chan...
Even though I was that bold when I had a fever...
What is wrong with me when my temperature is normal?!
How long have you been in here?!
The Olympus Has Thrown Down the Gauntlet?
The Olympus is going to win at this year's festival.
It seems there are still some old-fashioned jazz musicians around,
but this is the era of rock n' roll.
They were handing this out all over the school.
What are you going to do?
I mean, you cannot take this sitting down, right?!
You two are going to perform in the festival, are not you?!
We start with Moanin' to fire up the people that saw us last year
an' fake'them out thinking we are going to do the same routine.
But then we move into some other songs that we want to play.
I was thinkin' the same thing!
Alright, let us choose our next song!
Starting today, we would better practice every day!
Dad says he is comin' home!
This way, the whole family can live together!
What are you doing here all by yourself?
I cannot say that I am actually scared...
See, our Dad, who was working far away, is coming home tomorrow morning.
Richie, I am one of those that are not got a place in the house, too.
Hey, you are back late, Sachiko.
What is Richie doing here with you?
Unlike with Kota and the other little ones,
you remember how scary Dad was when he was drunk.
Ma told me that Dad worked really hard an' quit drinkin' over there.
You got nothing to worry about, Sachiko.
Now how about comin' inside an' we can prepare together?
Oh, thanks for lookin' after her.
You are the one I am worried about, Sen.
What are you lookin' so serious for?!
Are you coming to practice tomorrow?
After all, playin' with you is the most fun I have.
It is not comin' out right.
I am sorry for lying to you.
I was looking forward to the festival, too.
I waited for you on that slope
There was a'goodbye' blurred far away
I was so weak, so awkward, and so fragile back then
But you gave me a small pair of wings
In the twilight hour of the sky,
I am searching for a gleam of light
If only I could have said that I love you
The note that I wrote in the corner of my textbook
has never been delivered to this day
